text: DOCTOR: So, so my plan right now is to give you about two or three courses and do a repeat scan.

PATIENT: Oh it’s every three weeks.
DOCTOR: Correct.
PATIENT: So I would take two or three treatments?
DOCTOR: Uh, I’m thinking right now three, three, then we do a repeat scan. And if it’s working, if things are shrinking in there, we keep going.
FAMILY MEMBER: Uh hum.
DOCTOR: On an average people get six. The typical sort of maximum if people are having a tremendous benefit and doing fine with it, you know I can go up to ten. But, but we’ll see how it goes.
